attributes.action: Vote Jacqui Smith forward for next Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Her continuing sense or morality precedes her, her shrewed financial awareness is exactly what Britain needs in this time of crisis. Perhaps she could entice Derek Conway to join her to make a Labour Party we can all be proud of.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
